description:

⚙️ Rising cloud costs and energy demands are reshaping data center strategies. Joy Deng explores how energy efficiency, workload consolidation, and cloud repatriation optimize infrastructure performance while ensuring scalability and resilience. Learn practical steps to transform your data center into a cost-efficient, high-performing system!

title: Optimizing Data Centers: Energy Efficiency & Cloud Repatriation Strategies
